document.full_text: prime minister nuri kamal al-maliki said wednesday that he would meet with iraqi leaders to discuss whether the united states military should remain after the end of the year.
document.title: iraqis to talk about asking some u.s. troops to stay
lines_and_colors: prime minister nuri kamal al-maliki said wednesday that he would meet with iraqi leaders to discuss whether the united states military should remain after the end of the year.
